title: Trillions Wasted on Subsidies Could Help Address Climate Change | World Bank Report
description: The World Bank reveals how trillions in wasteful subsidies for agriculture, fishing, and fossil fuels could be repurposed for climate action. Learn how reformed policies could address environmental degradation and pave the way for a sustainable future.
